comment: CR-026 pre-review COMPLIANT. Frontmatter verified: title='QMS CLI Extensibility Refactoring', revision_summary='Initial draft' (acceptable for v0.1 per SOP-001 Section 5.1). All 12 CR sections present per SOP-002 Section 6: Purpose, Scope (with Context/Changes Summary/Files Affected subsections), Current State, Proposed State, Change Description (with 4 technical subsections), Justification, Impact Assessment, Testing Summary, Implementation Plan (5 phases, 22 tasks), Execution (EI table with 22 items), Execution Summary, and References. No prohibited placeholders (TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX) found. Execution-phase placeholders are correctly templated. Section numbering is correct and sequential. Code examples provided for all four new abstractions. Parent CR-025 properly referenced. Document is technically complete and procedurally compliant.

NON-COMPLIANT - Two deficiencies require correction before approval:

1. FRONTMATTER: revision_summary field contains 'Initial draft' which does not meet SOP-001 Section 5.1 requirements. For a v1.0 document, revision_summary must begin with the authorizing CR ID. Required format: 'CR-026: [description]' (e.g., 'CR-026: QMS CLI Extensibility Refactoring').

2. PLACEHOLDER CONTENT: Execution Comments table (Section 10) contains placeholder row '[COMMENT] | [PERFORMER] - [DATE]'. Either remove this placeholder row if no execution comments were recorded, or replace with actual comments.

All 22 EIs have Pass outcomes with complete documentation. Technical content appears satisfactory. Correct the two documentation deficiencies and re-route for post-review.

Review of CR-026 after corrections. VERIFIED CORRECTIONS: (1) revision_summary now correctly starts with CR ID: 'CR-026: QMS CLI Extensibility Refactoring - All 22 EIs completed'. (2) Execution Comments table placeholder replaced with actual comment: 'All execution items completed successfully; routed for post-review'. FRONTMATTER: title present and valid, revision_summary present and compliant. STRUCTURE: All 12 required sections present (Purpose through References). EXECUTION TABLE: All 22 EIs complete with Task Description, Execution Summary, Task Outcome, and Performed By - Date. PLACEHOLDERS: None found (no TBD, TODO, FIXME, XXX). FORMATTING: Consistent throughout, proper section numbering, valid markdown. RECOMMENDATION: Approve. Document is fully compliant with SOP-002 requirements.
